other_tests.findings: Positive for orange disperse 3 (3+), para-phenylendiamine (3+), thimerosal (2+), gentamicin (3+), nickel sulphate (3+).
Negative at the end of desensitization; side effects included localized urticaria, stomach-ache, and oral itching.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-desensitization, the boy could drink about 300 ml of milk daily; however, he later developed anaphylactic reactions with exercise following milk ingestion.

other_tests.findings: 8-mm-positive prick by prick test with cow's milk.
Value of 4.80 KU/l for cow milk-specific IgE (normal value <0.35 KaU/l).
